title: Alpha Client log in troubles?
body:
I recently got a new computer. (a VERY nice computer compared to my old laptop.)

I downloaded the Alpha and Beta, but the Alpha will not let me log in. 

It says my account does not yet have Alpha Access?

Has my access been revoked? Has it ran out? Or is it something to do with switching PCs?

replies.body:
Make sure you're logging in to the right account that was accepted. It's easy to be confused by which account was accepted if you have many accounts tied to one email address. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

I am using the same account. 

The above comment says that their are two different Alpha Clients. Would they have different downloads? And I somehow downloaded the wrong one?


My real question, would you be able to grant me the download for the Alpha Client associated with my PBE Account?


*EDIT*

Plot thickens. I hit the 'Forgot Username?' just to make sure I hadn't forgotten it somehow, and it sent the username I am trying to sign in with to my email. 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Can you expand the Region/Language area and send me a screenshot of which region and language you're selecting with your login? 


(click to enlarge)


http://imgur.com/a/APM3u

keep in mind that there are currently 4 different clients;

* PBE (Beta)
* PBE Alpha (Alpha client using PBE access)
* Live
* Live Alpha (Alpha client using Live access)

If you have PBE access, you would have PBE alpha access, but you won't necessarily have Live Alpha access, unless you specifically received an invitation to alpha client on your live account.
But how would I have downloaded the wrong client?

I dunno, its possible you downloaded the wrong client. But then again, I recall that I wasn't able to download the Alpha Live until I got access.

If you were given alpha access, try to post it in the alpha boards. Maybe someone who has experienced the same thing can help you.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion

It is also possible that you are using different logins for PBE & live?

EDIT: Oh, make sure you select the proper reigon as well. My EUW account doesn't have alpha access, but my NA one does. So I can only log in through NA reigon, when I try to use EUW, it'll say that the account doesn't have access to alpha.

Thank you for your help. I know for sure that I am signing into the correct username. 
(I used the same username and password as my live client.)

But I am going to try to post in the Alpha Boards if what I am downloading now doesn't work. 

Again, thank you
